resources.string: The app is created as a learning project in Udacity by AnnaSava.
In this app the songs of the world of Gray Lands are collected. The world and the songs belong to their author Aneily Stranger.
It\'s a young folk-rock group, with a lot ethnic themes from wolf\'s and bear\'s clans. Sounds of flute and viola da gambra dominate. Some songs are performed a Cappella.
This group was founded a several time ago, but is not famous over boundary of Tergars Empire. They started from gothic rock, but now play sympho and atmospheric black, with male and female vocals.
The trio from Manticore clan of virvy. Their music is between of psychedelic rock and post-punk. All texts are based on tales and creepy stories.
The an-tekke band playing folk-metal. They haven\'t constant structure of group and play with many session musicians. So the same song may sound very different.
